attributes.action: make every one connected to a ward from cleaners to consultants aware that a patient has dementia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a colour code was shown on the wall above a patient with dementia , it would make every one aware that that person did not have a voice, and stop the confusion over wandering falling and eating, this in turn would save the patient from being starved at mealtimes, trying to get out of bed unaided, suffering in silence when they are cold or uncomfortable, as someone could alert a nurse.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
